resources.string: An unexpected error has occurred. Would you like to send the error in an email to the developer?

"Location Services are disabled in Phone > Settings.
You must have at least one location service enabled. "
"Displays the name of the location being viewed. If the name of the phone's current location cannot be retrieved, Unknown will display."

Displays the index of the location being viewed as well as the total number of locations. The current location of the phone will always be index #1. Swipe your finger up/down on the screen to page through the saved locations.
Displays the coordinates of the location being viewed.
If the location being viewed is the current location of the phone and not a saved location, the text (current) will display.
Displays an image showing an approximate representation of the current moon.
"If the moon is currently visible from the phone's location, the text moon is currently visible will be displayed. This information is based on an unobstructed view of the horizon in a level area."
"Represents the time when the upper edge of the disk of the moon crests the Earth's horizon."
"Represents the time when the upper edge of the disk of the moon falls below the Earth's horizon."
Represents the time at which the moon is highest in the sky on any given day.
"Indicates the percent of the moon's visible surface illuminated by the sun."
The number of days since the last new moon.
Approximate distance in kilometers from the center of the Earth to the center of the moon.

"An approximation, based on the distance of the moon, that indicates the size of the moon relative to it's size at perigee (closest piont). Given as % of Max, where Max is the size of the moon at the closest point of its orbit."
Represents the date of the next full moon.
Represents the date of the next new moon.

"MoonShine by Bad Daddy Apps
Times are based on an unobstructed view of the horizon in a level region.
All times, measurements and images should be considered approximations. No guarantee of accuracy is made."
Please email the developer with any question, comments, bug reports or suggestions at baddaddy7@gmail.com
